name: bitmovin-player-roku-analytics-conviva
description: Integration of the Bitmovin Roku Player SDK with the Conviva Analytics.
author: Bitmovin

scripts.serve:component: npm run clean:component && npm run ensure_dist_folder && npm-run-all --parallel watch:component server
scripts.build:component: npm run ensure_dist_folder && cd ./ConvivaIntegration/ && npx bestzip ../dist/bitmovin-player-conviva-analytics.zip ./ && cd ..
scripts.build:example: rsync -a ./ConvivaIntegration/components/ ./demo/components/ && npm run ensure_dist_folder && cd demo && npx bestzip ../dist/bitmovin-player-conviva-analytics-demo ./ && cd ..
